name: Ritz Limousines
address: Ritz Limousines, 1039 E 63rd Ave, Vancouver, BC V5X 2L2

featured_reviews.review_id: We have booked Ritz Limousines on two separate occasions, with both bookings being very last minute. Ritz went above and beyond to accommodate our requests on both occasions. They excelled in punctuality, arriving exactly as scheduled. Their customer service was impeccable with courteous and attentive drivers. Vehicles were new, comfortable and spotless, ensuring we had a smooth and enjoyable experience. We would highly recommend Ritz Limousines to anyone looking for a limousine service!
featured_reviews.review_text: We have booked Ritz Limousines on two separate occasions, with both bookings being very last minute. Ritz went above and beyond to accommodate our requests on both occasions. They excelled in punctuality, arriving exactly as scheduled. We would highly recommend Ritz Limousines to anyone looking for a limousine service!

featured_reviews.review_id: Overall it was a good experience.  Although I was expecting a black vehicle, as I was shown in previous photos, and what arrived was a white (and clearly older and well-ridden in model).  Moe the driver was very pleasant and a really appreciated the text and email reminder/confirmations along the way.  Thank you Ritz for a great afternoon/evening!
featured_reviews.review_text: Overall it was a good experience. Moe the driver was very pleasant and a really appreciated the text and email reminder/confirmations along the way.  Thank you Ritz for a great afternoon/evening!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Incredible company to work with! Jeff was so efficient in following up with us and getting our group booked in, the Limo we rented was gorgeous, it looked brand new and our highlight of the night was our OUTSTANDING driver, Jay!! We couldn't have asked for a better experience all thanks to him, he was so helpful and patient with our large group, it made all the difference- Thank you Jay!

I will definitely be using Ritz limousines again in the future, they are the best we've worked with!

Thank you Ritz!!

featured_reviews.review_id: This is the second year we've used Ritz Limousines for our dental office and they truly are amazing. Best part was we even got the same driver, Jay, who was the best . He was there early to pick us up, also very patient. The party bus we got was really nice and exactly what we needed. It fit the whole crew comfortably. The lights and sound system was the best. Can't beat rolling up to good ol' nickleback lol. I very highly recommend this company from its booking staff to the Limo Driver, they are hands down the best in all areas. Thank you Ritz!

featured_reviews.review_id: This was a perfect experience - we used Ritz Limos to get from one venue to another with our family for my sisters wedding. It was so much fun to have everyone stay together in between ceremony and reception. It was a 10/10 experience and I would highly recommend their services. The planning and communication beforehand was clear and so easy to work with. They went above and beyond for us!
featured_reviews.review_text: This was a perfect experience - we used Ritz Limos to get from one venue to another with our family for my sisters wedding. It was so much fun to have everyone stay together in between ceremony and reception. It was a 10/10 experience and I would highly recommend their services. The planning and communication beforehand was clear and so easy to work with. They went above and beyond for us!

featured_reviews.review_id: The bus was absolutely beautiful! So clean, spacious and the sound system was amazing. It was a very smooth ride and the driver Raj took us to some great spots for photos. They even upgraded us to a bus which was unexpected and super kind! We had a wonderful time! This company does need a little more organization and better communication with customers. I was called multiple times and asked the same questions and one of the phone calls was over 10 minutes long and I was already on my vacation. They also wanted the tip before we started and hounded me for it over the phone, in person, and also in a text message during our drive. All in all we had a great time and everyone was friendly but a little more organization would have been nice and not to be bugged about a tip the whole time.

featured_reviews.review_id: We hired Ritz for our wedding and they went above and beyond to ensure excellent service. After losing my wallet at some point in the night, I phoned Ritz the day after and Sonny searched the bus, found it, and arranged to meet me to drop it off after working another event. They are easy to work with, punctual, and thoughtful. Highly recommend!
featured_reviews.review_text: We hired Ritz for our wedding and they went above and beyond to ensure excellent service. After losing my wallet at some point in the night, I phoned Ritz the day after and Sonny searched the bus, found it, and arranged to meet me to drop it off after working another event. They are easy to work with, punctual, and thoughtful. Highly recommend!

featured_reviews.review_id: I was so impressed with the Ritz's customer service.  We barely fit into the fill sized SUV for the first trip, and they sent a coach for our second at the same price! They showed up about 20 minutes early for our first trip, and showed up an hour and fifteen minutes early for our second! They waited for us both times. No need to worry about missing a connection with that kind of promptness. We had the same driver for both trips, Rey, and he was courteous, friendly, and professional. I was very impressed with Ritz Limousines. Would definitely use again!
